teleportPlayer(Player, LocalGate) - Method in class org.bennedum.transporter.api.API
Teleports the specified player as if they stepped into the specified gate.
teleportPlayer(Player, Gate) - Method in class org.bennedum.transporter.api.API
Teleports the specified player to the specified gate.
teleportPlayer(Player, RemoteServer) - Method in class org.bennedum.transporter.api.API
Teleports the specified player to the spawn location in the default world on the specified server.
teleportPlayer(Player, RemoteWorld) - Method in class org.bennedum.transporter.api.API
Teleports the specified player to the spawn location in the specified remote world.
teleportPlayer(Player, RemoteLocation) - Method in class org.bennedum.transporter.api.API
Teleports the specified player to the specified remote location.
toFacing() - Method in enum org.bennedum.transporter.api.SpawnDirection
Returns the equivalent BlockFace for this spawn direction, or null if there is no equivalent.
TransporterException - Exception in org.bennedum.transporter.api
Base class for all Transporter exceptions.

Creates a new exception.
